content: setup row 2 k2 sl1yo brkinc in sl1yo from prev row sl2pwyif 8 setup row 3 k2 sl1yo k1 sl1yo brkinc sl2pwyif 10 repeat row repeat ad nauseum k2 sl1yo k1 sl1yo *brk sl1yo* repeat between the asterisks until 3 stitches remain the last sl1yo from the previous row and the 2 icord sts brkinc sl2pwyif 12 14 16 etc and that s it we just repeat that row until we either almost run out of yarn we get bored or it s as big as we want it to be you can use your preferred stretchy bind off i think i will probably use jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off glossary term definition k knit brk brioche knit knitting the yo and slipped st as one brkinc brioche increase brk yo brk all in the same st yo yarn over sl1yo slip 1 stitch purlwise and yo at the same time sl2pwyif slip 2 sts purlwise with the yarn in front
